author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MCBC Holdings Reports Q3 Earnings Per Share $0.61
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - MCBC Holdings Inc:
* MCBC HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FISCAL 2018 THIRD-QUARTER AND YEAR-TO-DATE RESULTS
* Q3 SALES $93.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $88.8 MILLION * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.47 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FOR FULL FISCAL YEAR-END JUNE 30, 2018 EXPECTS NET SALES GROWTH TO BE IN LOW- TO MID-40 PERCENT RANGE
* FOR FULL FISCAL YEAR-END JUNE 30, 2018 ADJUSTED EPS IS EXPECTED TO GROW IN HIGH-40 PERCENT RANGE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
